name: backside-client
description: Javascript client for interacting with Backside backend as a service.

scripts.watch: mkdir -p dist && http-server & NODE_ENV=development watchify --detect-globals false index.js --s Backside -t envify -d -o dist/backside-debug.js
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && NODE_ENV=production browserify --detect-globals false index.js --s Backside -t envify -o dist/backside.js && NODE_ENV=production browserify --detect-globals index.js --s Backside -t envify -g uglifyify -o dist/backside.min.js

author: Trevor Dixon
